properties.name: Luxury Manhattan Loft
properties.description: Stunning 3-bedroom loft with panoramic city views. Features floor-to-ceiling windows, smart home technology, and premium finishes throughout. Building amenities include 24/7 concierge, fitness center, and rooftop terrace.

properties.name: Charming Vermont Cottage
properties.description: Quaint 2-bedroom cottage nestled in the Green Mountains. Features a wood-burning fireplace, wraparound porch, and private hiking trails. Perfect year-round getaway with ski resorts just 15 minutes away.

properties.name: Modern Lakefront Condo
properties.description: Sleek 2-bedroom condo with breathtaking lake views. Open floor plan with high-end appliances, walk-in closets, and private balcony. Building features resort-style pool, business center, and secure parking.

properties.name: Historic Brownstone
properties.description: Exquisitely restored 4-story brownstone with original details. Features chef's kitchen, 5 bedrooms, home office, and private garden. Located in one of Brooklyn's most sought-after neighborhoods.

properties.name: Desert Modern Villa
properties.description: Architectural masterpiece with mountain views. Floor-to-ceiling glass walls, infinity pool, and smart home features. Includes guest house and outdoor entertainment area with fire pit.

properties.name: Skyline Penthouse
properties.description: Breathtaking 5,000 sqft penthouse with 360Â° city and lake views. Features include a private rooftop terrace with hot tub, smart home automation, chef's kitchen with premium appliances, and a home theater. Floor-to-ceiling windows showcase stunning sunsets over Lake Michigan.
